sentences.en: Falling coffee prices have impoverished many developing economies.
sentences.cn: 咖啡价格下跌使很多发展中的经济面临困境。
过度耕作而使土壤变得贫瘠.

sentences.en: Impoverish the soil overuse . See Synonyms at deplete.
sentences.cn: 过度耕作而使土壤变得贫瘠参见.

sentences.en: Reducing the income will further impoverish these families and could tempt an offender into further crime.
sentences.cn: 降低收入只会使这些家庭更加贫穷，而且可能诱使不法分子进一步犯罪。

sentences.en: These changes are likely to impoverish single-parent families even further.
sentences.cn: 这些变革很可能使单亲家庭更加贫困。

sentences.en: Thy worship does not impoverish the world.
sentences.cn: 对你供献不会使世界困穷.

sentences.en: We need to reduce the burden of taxes that impoverish the economy.
sentences.cn: 我们需要减轻导致经济困顿的税收负荷。

words.tran_cn: 穷困的；用尽了的，无创造性的
贫穷；致使贫乏或贫瘠之事物

trans.tran_cn: 使贫穷，使贫瘠或恶化，耗尽…的力气
